column3:
Lisa has a pet cat named Whiskers. Whiskers is black with a white spot on her
ewlinechest. Whiskers also has white paws that look like little white mittens.
ewline
ewlineWhiskers likes to sleep in the sun on her favorite chair. Whiskers
ewlinealso likes to drink creamy milk.
ewline
ewlineLisa is excited because on Saturday, Whiskers turns two years
ewlineold.
ewline
ewlineAfter school on Friday, Lisa rushes to the pet store. She wants to buy
ewlineWhiskers' birthday presents. Last year, she gave Whiskers a play mouse
ewlineand a blue feather.
ewline
ewlineFor this birthday, Lisa is going to give Whiskers a red ball of yarn
ewlineand a bowl with a picture of a cat on the side. The picture is of a
ewlineblack cat. It looks a lot like Whiskers.
column4: multiple: What day is Whisker's Birthday?
column9: multiple: What does Whiskers like to do?
column10: Sleep in the sun and drink creamy milk
column15: All white with a black spot
column18: Black with white paws and a white spot
column19: multiple: What does Lisa buy for Whiskers for this birthday?
column20: A bowl with a cat on it
column22: A red ball of yarn and a bowl with a cat on it
